trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism that data source controls use to bind to application variables, user identities and choices, and other data.
trans-unit.target: 提供数据源控件使用绑定到应用程序变量、 用户标识和选择，以及其他数据的机制。

trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET parameter types.
trans-unit.target: 用作所有 ASP.NET 参数类型的基类。

trans-unit.source: The Parameter class represents a parameter in a parameterized SQL query, a filtering expression, or a business object method call that an ASP.NET data source control uses to select, filter, or modify data.
trans-unit.target: 参数类表示中参数化的 SQL 查询、 筛选表达式或用于 ASP.NET 数据源控件用于选择、 筛选或修改数据的业务对象方法调用的参数。

trans-unit.source: Parameter objects are contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 参数对象包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: Parameter objects are evaluated at run time, to bind the values of the variables they represent to whatever method is used by a data source control to interact with data.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，将绑定到数据源控件使用任何方法来与数据交互，它们表示的变量的值计算参数对象。

trans-unit.source: Use classes that derive from Parameter with data source and data-bound controls to build Web-based data applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用与数据源和数据绑定控件可以生成基于 Web 的数据应用程序从参数派生的类。

trans-unit.source: These parameter classes are used by data source controls to bind specific kinds of values found in Web applications to placeholders in SQL query strings, business object method parameters, and more.
trans-unit.target: 由数据源控件使用的这些参数类用于绑定在 Web 应用程序到 SQL 查询字符串、 业务对象方法参数和的详细信息中的占位符中找到值的特定类型。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists parameter types that are included in ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了包含在 ASP.NET 中的参数类型。

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>|Binds any public property of a Web server control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>|Binds a form field.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter>|Binds a session-state field.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RouteParameter>|Binds a route URL parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter>|Binds a cookie field.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter>|Binds a query-string parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ProfileParameter>|Binds a profile field.| Extend the base Parameter class when you want to implement your own custom parameter types.
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>|将 Web 服务器控件的任何公共属性。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>|将绑定的表单域。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter>|将绑定的会话状态字段。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RouteParameter>|将某个路由 URL 参数绑定。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter>|将绑定 cookie 字段。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter>|将某个查询字符串参数绑定。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ProfileParameter>|将绑定的配置文件字段。 | 当你想要实现您自己的自定义参数类型扩展的基类的参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ProfileParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RouteParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: Parameter objects are very simple: they have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> property, can be represented declaratively, and can track state across multiple HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 参数对象是非常简单︰ 它们具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>属性，可以以声明方式表示，可以跟踪跨多个 HTTP 请求的状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: All parameters support a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> property, for cases when a parameter is bound to a value, but the value evaluates to `null` at run time.
trans-unit.target: 所有参数都支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>属性，用例时参数绑定到一个值，但值的计算结果为`null`在运行时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using a collection of Parameter objects with a data source control, their order in the collection might matter.
trans-unit.target: 在与数据源控件使用的参数对象的集合，集合中的其顺序可能重要。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how parameters are used, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用参数的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ObjectDataSource 控件与使用参数](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新默认实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object created with the Parameter constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>使用所有其属性的默认值初始化的参数构造函数创建的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> property is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>属性初始化为<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>属性初始化为<xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>属性初始化为<xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>属性初始化为`null`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> </xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> class, using the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>类，使用指定的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object created with the Parameter constructor is initialized with the specified `name` and default values for its other properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>使用参数构造函数创建的对象初始化具有指定`name`和其他属性的默认值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> property is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>属性初始化为<xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>属性初始化为<xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>属性初始化为`null`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> </xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> class with the values of the original, specified instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>类的值的原始的、 指定的实例。

trans-unit.source: The Parameter constructor is a `protected` copy constructor used to clone a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> instance.
trans-unit.target: 参数构造函数是`protected`复制构造函数用于克隆<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>实例。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> properties are all transferred to the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>属性是否传输到新实例。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> instance from which the current instance is initialized.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref>从当前实例已初始化实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> class, using the specified name and database type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>类，使用指定的名称和数据库类型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object created with the Parameter constructor is initialized with the specified `name` and `dbType` parameters, and with default values for other properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>使用参数构造函数创建的对象初始化具有指定`name`和`dbType`参数，并使用其他属性的默认值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> property is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>属性初始化为<xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>属性初始化为`null`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The database type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 参数的数据库类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> class, using the specified name and type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>类，使用指定的名称和类型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object created with the Parameter constructor is initialized with the specified `name` and `type` parameters, and default values for other properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>使用参数构造函数创建的对象初始化具有指定`name`和`type`参数和其他属性的默认值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> property is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>属性初始化为<xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>属性初始化为`null`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TypeCode> that describes the type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TypeCode>描述参数的类型。</xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> class, using the specified name, the specified database type, and the specified value for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>类，使用指定的名称、 指定的数据库类型和指定的值其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> instance is initialized to <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>实例初始化为<xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>.</xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>属性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The database type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 数据库类型<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> instance, if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> is bound to a value that is not yet initialized when <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Evaluate*> is called.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>实例，如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>绑定到一个值，尚未初始化时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Evaluate*>称为。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Evaluate*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> class, using the specified name, the specified type, and the specified string for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>类，使用指定的名称、 指定的类型和指定的字符串其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object created with the Parameter constructor is initialized with the specified `name` parameter and `type` parameter, and assigned a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>使用参数构造函数创建的对象初始化具有指定`name`参数和`type`参数，并分配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>属性初始化为<xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>.</xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TypeCode> that describes the type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TypeCode>描述参数的类型。</xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: A string that serves as a default value for the parameter, if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> is bound to a value that is not yet initialized when <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Evaluate*> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果用作参数，默认值的字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>绑定到一个值，尚未初始化时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Evaluate*>称为。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Evaluate*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a duplicate of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的重复<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The Clone method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter%29> copy constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> class with the values of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 克隆方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter%29>复制构造函数以初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>类的当前实例的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter%29>

trans-unit.source: If you extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> class, you can override the Clone method to include any state that should be copied to a new instance of your derived class.
trans-unit.target: 如果扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>类，你可以重写克隆方法以包括任何状态，应复制到派生类的新实例</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> that is an exact duplicate of the current one.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref>是当前的精确副本。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> value to an equivalent <xref:System.TypeCode> value.
trans-unit.target: 将转换<xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>值为等效<xref:System.TypeCode>值。</xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: This method returns an <xref:System.TypeCode> instance if no equivalent for the <xref:System.Data.DbType> value is found.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref:System.TypeCode>实例如果无等效<xref:System.Data.DbType>找到值。</xref:System.Data.DbType> </xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: Database types without equivalent types include <xref:System.Data.DbType>, <xref:System.Data.DbType>, and <xref:System.Data.DbType>.
trans-unit.target: 数据库类型没有等效的类型包括<xref:System.Data.DbType>， <xref:System.Data.DbType>，和<xref:System.Data.DbType>。</xref:System.Data.DbType> </xref:System.Data.DbType> </xref:System.Data.DbType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> value to convert to an equivalent <xref:System.TypeCode> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref>要转换为等效值<xref:System.TypeCode>值。</xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TypeCode> value that is equivalent to the specified <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TypeCode>等效于指定的值<xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>值。</xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object is bound to should be converted to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if it is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否值的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>对象都绑定到应将它转换为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>若是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: If the ConvertEmptyStringToNull property of the parameter is changed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数的 ConvertEmptyStringToNull 属性已更改，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> is bound to should be converted to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> when it is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果值的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>是绑定到应转换为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>时将其<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.TypeCode> value to an equivalent <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 将转换<xref:System.TypeCode>值为等效<xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>值。</xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: This method returns an <xref:System.Data.DbType> instance if no equivalent is found.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回<xref:System.Data.DbType>实例如果找到无等效项。</xref:System.Data.DbType>

trans-unit.source: Types without equivalent database types include <xref:System.TypeCode> and <xref:System.TypeCode>.
trans-unit.target: 无等效数据库类型的类型包括<xref:System.TypeCode>和<xref:System.TypeCode>.</xref:System.TypeCode> </xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TypeCode> value to convert to an equivalent <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TypeCode>要转换为等效值<xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>值。</xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> value that is equivalent to the specified <xref:System.TypeCode> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref>等效于指定的值<xref:System.TypeCode>值。</xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the database type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置参数的数据库类型。

trans-unit.source: The database type can be used to create strongly typed parameters, so that values are converted correctly between your Web application and underlying code or values from database tables.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用数据库类型来创建强类型的参数，以便你的 Web 应用程序和基础代码或数据库表中的值之间的值正确转换。

trans-unit.source: If the database type of the parameter is changed by setting the DbType property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过设置 DbType 属性中，更改参数的数据库类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The database type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 数据库类型<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value that is not in the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将此属性设置为一个值，将不在<xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a default value for the parameter, should the value that the parameter is bound to be uninitialized when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Evaluate*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 指定的默认值对于参数，应参数的值绑定到被取消初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Evaluate*>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Evaluate*>

trans-unit.source: The DefaultValue property is used in scenarios where the parameter is bound to a value, but the value is `null` or cannot be resolved when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object is evaluated.
trans-unit.target: DefaultValue 属性用于的方案在参数绑定到一个值，但值很`null`时无法解析或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象的评估结果。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: If the DefaultValue property of the parameter is changed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改参数的 DefaultValue 属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that serves as a default value for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> when the value it is bound to cannot be resolved or is uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 用作默认值为一个字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>当绑定到的值无法解析或未初始化。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object is used to bind a value to a control, or the control can be used to change the value.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>对象用于将值绑定到控件，或该控件可以用于更改的值。

trans-unit.source: The Direction property is currently not used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> class and is reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 通过当前未使用的方向属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>类，这是保留供将来使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The Direction property describes the direction of the flow of data between the value that a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> instance is bound to and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object itself.
trans-unit.target: 方向属性描述的值之间的数据流方向的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>实例绑定到与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象本身。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The default value for the Direction property, <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>, describes the most common scenario where the flow of data is always in one direction: from the value to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object.
trans-unit.target: 默认值方向属性<xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>，描述最常见的方案的数据流中始终处于一个方向︰ 成的值从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>

trans-unit.source: Any changes made to the underlying value are reflected by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object, but any changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object are not reflected by the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 对基础值进行任何更改都会反映通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象，但对任何更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象也不会反映基础数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: You can set the Direction property to <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> or <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> when working with output parameters, or <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> when working with a return value from a stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将方向属性设置为<xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>或<xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>时使用的输出参数或<xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>时使用的存储过程的返回值。</xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>

trans-unit.source: If the Direction property of the parameter is changed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改参数的方向属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Direction is set to <xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"></xref> by default.
trans-unit.target: 方向均设置为<xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"></xref>默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: Updates and returns the value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 更新，并返回的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the Evaluate method is to return `null` in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Evaluate 方法的默认实现是返回`null`在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> class override the Evaluate method to return an updated parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>方法重写评估方法来返回已更新的参数的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object returns the value of the control that it is bound to, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter> object retrieves the current name/value pair from the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>对象返回它所绑定到控件的值时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter>对象检索当前的名称/值对从<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>对象。</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> of the request.
trans-unit.target: 当前<xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>的请求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>参数绑定到。

trans-unit.source: If the parameter is not bound to a control, the `control` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数未绑定到控件，`control`参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""></xref> that represents the updated and current value of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""> </xref>表示参数的更新和当前值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> value that is equivalent to the CLR type of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>等效于当前的 CLR 类型的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DbType%2A> property must not already have been set, or must be set to <xref:System.Data.DbType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DbType%2A>属性必须尚未已设置，或必须设置为<xref:System.Data.DbType>。</xref:System.Data.DbType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DbType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use only when the CLR type is set but the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DbType%2A> property is not.
trans-unit.target: 仅在设置的 CLR 类型时，此方法旨在用于但<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DbType%2A>属性不是。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DbType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> value that is equivalent to the CLR type of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref>等效于当前的 CLR 类型的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DbType*> property is already set to a value other than <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DbType*>属性已设置为值非<xref href="System.Data.DbType"> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DbType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object is saving changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>对象是否保存对其视图状态的更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source view is marked to save its state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果数据源视图被标记为保存其状态，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Restores the data source view's previously saved view state.
trans-unit.target: 还原数据源视图的以前保存的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method restores view-state information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还原视图状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象从已保存的上一个页面请求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.SaveViewState%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.SaveViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> state to restore.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>要还原状态。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects are not required to have a name; however, data source controls might use the parameter name to match a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object in a collection with a parameter in a SQL query or business method signature.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象不需要有一个名称;但是，数据源控件可能使用的参数名称匹配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>与 SQL 查询或业务方法签名中的参数集合中的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control can use the name of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object to match a placeholder in a parameterized SQL query.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件可以使用的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象以匹配参数化 SQL 查询中的占位符。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control can use the name of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection to match a placeholder in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 同样，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件可以使用的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合以匹配中的占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the name is not used and the order in which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object is added to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> collection is more important.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，不使用的名称和顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>集合是更重要。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ObjectDataSource 控件与使用参数](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the name of the parameter is changed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改参数的名称，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.OnParametersChanged*> method of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> collection that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.OnParametersChanged*>方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref>集合，其中包含<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.OnParametersChanged*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object is not contained by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> collection, calling the OnParameterChanged method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象不包含的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>集合，调用 OnParameterChanged 方法不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object is contained by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> collection, OnParameterChanged raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.ParametersChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象包含由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>集合，OnParameterChanged 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.ParametersChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件的集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.ParametersChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> collection is contained by a data source control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.ParametersChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event raises the data source control's <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.DataSourceChanged> event, causing any data-bound controls to rebind.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>集合包含由数据源控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.ParametersChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件引发的数据源控件<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.DataSourceChanged>事件，从而导致重新绑定任何数据绑定控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.DataSourceChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.ParametersChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnParameterChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnParameterChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object's view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 将保存的更改<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>自页回发到服务器的时间的对象的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: 这些值会自动放在服务器控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>属性，它是<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>类</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>的实例</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象。

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `hidden` element.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态保存时，此字符串对象返回到客户端作为变量存储在 HTML`hidden`元素。

trans-unit.source: When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在创作自定义服务器控件时，你可以通过重写此方法并修改你的服务器控件的提高效率<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ViewState%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>包含到更改<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>视图状态。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the object, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有与对象关联的视图状态，则此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Marks the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object so its state will be recorded in view state.
trans-unit.target: 标记<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>对象，以便将视图状态中记录其状态。

trans-unit.source: The SetDirty method is called directly by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, to mark the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object so that its state is recorded in view state.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用 SetDirty 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，以将标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象，以便在视图状态中记录其状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.SetDirtyObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置参数的大小。

trans-unit.source: When the value for Size is changed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 大小的值更改时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The size of the parameter expressed as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 表示为整数参数的大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns a duplicate of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的重复<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Clone%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter%29> constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> class with the values of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Clone%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter%29>构造函数初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>类的当前实例的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> class, you can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Clone%2A> method to include any state that should be copied to a new instance of your derived class.
trans-unit.target: 如果扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>类，你可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Clone%2A>方法，包括任何状态，应复制到派生类的新实例</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Clone%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> that is a copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref> ，它是当前对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object is saving changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>对象是否保存对其视图状态的更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source view is marked to save its state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果数据源视图被标记为保存其状态，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Restores the data source view's previously saved view state.
trans-unit.target: 还原数据源视图的以前保存的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: This method restores view-state information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还原视图状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象从已保存的上一个页面请求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.SaveViewState%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.SaveViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to control how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写此方法，以控制自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> state to restore.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>要还原状态。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object's view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 将保存的更改<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>自页回发到服务器的时间的对象的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: 这些值会自动放在服务器控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>属性，它是<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>类</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>的实例</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象。

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `hidden` element.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态保存时，此字符串对象返回到客户端作为变量存储在 HTML`hidden`元素。

trans-unit.source: When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在创作自定义服务器控件时，你可以通过重写此方法并修改你的服务器控件的提高效率<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ViewState%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object's view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>包含到更改<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>对象的视图状态。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the object, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有与对象关联的视图状态，则此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object to track changes to its view state so they can be stored in the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*> object and persisted across requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: 导致<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>对象跟踪对其视图状态的更改，以便将它们存储在控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>对象并在相同页的请求间保留。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of this instance to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 将此实例的值转换为其等效的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object.
trans-unit.target: ToString 方法将返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object has no name, ToString returns <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象不具有名称、 ToString 返回<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the value of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例的值的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object to track changes to its view state so they can be stored in the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*> object and persisted across requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: 导致<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>对象跟踪对其视图状态的更改，以便将它们存储在控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>对象并在相同页的请求间保留。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置参数的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type can be used to create strongly typed parameters, so that values are converted correctly between your Web application and underlying code.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用类型来创建强类型的参数，以便你的 Web 应用程序与基础代码之间的值正确转换。

trans-unit.source: If the type of the parameter is changed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改参数的类型，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一种<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The parameter type is not one of the <xref:System.TypeCode> values.
trans-unit.target: 参数类型不是之一<xref:System.TypeCode>值。</xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object across multiple requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字典，使你能够保存和还原的视图状态的状态信息<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>跨多个请求在相同页的对象。

trans-unit.source: A parameter's view state is the accumulation of all its property values.
trans-unit.target: 参数的视图状态是其所有属性值的累计。

trans-unit.source: To preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use this property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class, to store the property values.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 HTTP 请求之间保留这些值，ASP.NET 服务器控件使用此属性，它是实例的<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>类中，以存储属性值。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>

trans-unit.source: The values are then passed as a variable to an HTML `hidden` input element when subsequent requests are processed.
trans-unit.target: 值然后传递作为变量给 HTML`hidden`处理后续请求时输入的元素。

trans-unit.source: View state is enabled for all server controls by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，为所有服务器控件启用视图状态。

trans-unit.source: For more information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关字典和如何使用它们的详细信息，请参阅[集合和数据结构](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object's view-state information.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>包含<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>对象的视图状态信息。
